ComicInfo.Summary:
SERIES FINALE!
THIS IS THE END!
The grand finale of MIRKA ANDOLFO's groundbreaking story is here! Don't worry, we won't spoil the ending for you; let's just say it's Leslie vs. the Glance with the Wolf in between. And yes, it's gonna be epic. But will Leslie live happily ever after?
